title: Tyson Fury rubbishes claims by Eddie Hearn that he is quitting boxing to focus on a career in WWE
text:
Tyson Fury has hit back at Eddie Hearn and insists he is talking 'a load of s***' after claims he is quitting boxing to focus on WWE.

The 31-year-old heavyweight is currently preparing for his first fight as a pro wrestler with Fury taking on Braun Strowman in Saudi Arabia on Thursday.

Estimates suggest Fury will bank close to £12million from his WWE commitments but when quizzed on Hearn's claims that his new project means he is quitting boxing, Fury did not react kindly.

Tyson Fury has responded to claims by Eddie Hearn that he has turned his back on boxing

The famous boxing promoter suggested that Fury's WWE debut is a sign he has lost the hunger

'I've no comment about it, it's a load of s***,' Fury said, when quizzed on Hearn's comments by the Manchester Evening News.

'I'm not interested in what Eddie Hearn says at all. I've no reply.

'In fact here's my reply to Eddie Hearn - concentrate on your life and not mine.'

Hearn went on to suggest that Fury has lost the hunger to keep fighting in the heavyweight division but it appears that that is not the case following these latest comments.

Fury will fight Braun Strowman for his wrestling debut before a rematch with Deontay Wilder

Fury is set to rematch with rival Deontay Wilder in February as the pair look to settle a drawn out feud since their frantic draw in December in Los Angeles.

The pair are due to meet in Las Vegas on February 22 with the WBC belt, currently held by Wilder, on the line.

While he is preparing for his WWE debut, a recent dig at Wilder helped reignite their rivalry.

Fury also insisted he is taking wrestling in WWE seriously and will knock his opponent out on Thursday.

He said: 'I have already got more American fans than Deontay Wilder. For whatever reasons Deontay Wilder is not popular in America and people don't like him,' Fury said.

'He screams "bomb squad" a lot and pretends to have a personality, but really he doesn't and there is no depth to him. He has got no substance, he is a loud mouth and screams "bomb squad" and that is it.

'Behind that there is no intellect, he comes out with random things that don't make sense. I am a trash talker, but sometimes I struggle to put together what he is talking about.'
